installation.script:
#! /bin/ash
adduser -D -h /home/container container

echo $POSTGRES_PASSWORD > .passwd

chown -R container: /mnt/server/

cat .passwd

su container -c 'initdb -D /mnt/server/postgres_db/ -A md5 -U container --pwfile .passwd'

mkdir -p /mnt/server/postgres_db/run/

echo -e "Done"
